hero.title: Empowering Businesses to Go AI-First
hero.description: We are driven by a passion for designing and deploying smart AI agents and automation systems that reduce repetitive work, make decisions based on data, and create better customer experiences.

vision.text: To build a future where technology works quietly in the background, removing friction from everyday business operations without manual effort.

mission.text: To empower businesses to run on AI agents by placing them at the center of their principal workflows, decisions, and customer interactions.

contextualIntelligence.title: Contextual Intelligence
contextualIntelligence.description: AI without context produces limited outcomes. True intelligence comes from understanding intent, history, and real-world conditions, enabling systems to respond accurately and act with relevance across every scenario.

scalableSecure.title: Scalable & Secure
scalableSecure.description: Reliable systems must grow with the business while remaining reliable and protected. Our platforms are designed to scale across teams and use cases, with security built in from the foundation to meet enterprise expectations.

customerCentric.title: Customer-Centric
customerCentric.description: Technology should adapt to the business, not the other way around. Every solution is designed around specific operational needs, ensuring measurable value, smoother adoption, and long-term alignment with customer goals.

2021.title: Company Founded
2021.description: Started our journey in Contextual Intelligence and SaaS

2022.title: AI-First Video Interview Platform
2022.description: Developed our first custom AI solution for video interviews and Hiring automation

2023a.title: First AI Chatbot with RAG and LLM
2023a.description: Built our first AI chatbot with RAG and LLM with Pharma and Avatar AI for Customer Support

2023b.title: Enterprise Growth
2023b.description: Expanded into industries such as Insurance and focused on accuracy, scale and security

2025.title: Voice Agents and Workflow Automation
2025.description: Developed voice agents and workflow automation for E-Commerce and Healthcare

2026.title: Full-funnel Customer Engagement
2026.description: Started building user-centric AI workflows for end-to-end sales and support operations

meetFounders.title: Meet our Founders
meetFounders.description: Behind Impelox is a passionate team of sales experts, product innovators.

aboutCTA.title: Ready to Become an AI-First Company?
aboutCTA.description: Move from isolated AI concepts to production-ready systems that automate real workflows and deliver measurable outcomes.

aiDeployment.title: Let's Deploy AI Tailored for Your Use Case
aiDeployment.description: 80% of your requirements can be streamlined with NA2 and our other sub-platforms. If your business demands systems designed around your exact needs, data, and constraints, we can deliver that.
aiDeployment.noGeneric: No generic workflows, no locked-in platforms.

hero.title: Build Work That Matters. Grow With the Team.
hero.description: We're a growing team that values thoughtful execution, clear ownership, and continuous learning. If you're excited about working in the AI industry, collaborating with smart people, and growing alongside a company, you'll fit right in.

workGetsDone.title: We Care About How Work Gets Done
workGetsDone.description: We believe great outcomes come from strong fundamentals—clear thinking, good communication, and respect for each other's time and effort. We move with purpose, and focus on doing the work.

ownership.title: Ownership Over Control
ownership.description: People at Impelox are trusted to own their work. We value initiative, accountability, and decision-making at every level. You're encouraged to speak up, take responsibility, and help shape how we grow.

collaboration.title: Collaboration Is the Default
collaboration.description: We work closely across teams. Engineers talk to customers. Product works with business teams. Ideas are shared openly, and feedback is part of how we improve—not something to avoid.

learning.title: Learning Through Doing
learning.description: You don't need to know everything on day one. We believe in learning through doing, asking questions, and improving continuously. Growth here is practical and hands-on.

clarity.title: Clarity Over Complexity
clarity.description: We value clear thinking and simple solutions. If something can be explained simply, it usually works better.

respect.title: Respect for People & Time
respect.description: We work with empathy and professionalism. Everyone's contribution matters.

longTerm.title: Build for the Long Term
longTerm.description: We focus on quality, sustainability, and decisions that make sense beyond short-term wins.

lifeAtImpelox.description: We move fast when needed, slow down when it matters, and always aim to improve.

items.directExposure: Direct Exposure To Customers And Real Problems
items.spaceToGrow: Space To Grow, Experiment, And Take On New Challenges

cta.title: Build Your Career Here!
cta.description: If you're looking for meaningful work, supportive teammates, and a culture that values your professional growth, we'd love to hear from you.

hero.title: When Off-the-Shelf Isn't Enough
hero.description: Our products solve most problems. But sometimes you need something built specifically for your business.

bespokeAgent.title: Bespoke Agent Development
bespokeAgent.description: Custom AI agents tailored to your exact workflow — unique approval processes, specialized interactions, industry-specific tasks. We design, build, integrate, and optimize.

chatbotRAG.title: Chatbot with RAG
chatbotRAG.description: Chatbots that understand your business. Answers questions accurately by pulling from your documentation and internal data. Deploy across web, LINE, or WhatsApp.

workflowAutomation.title: Contextually Intelligent Workflow Automation
workflowAutomation.description: Automation that understands context — adapting to exceptions and handling complexity that rule-based systems can't.

aiSaaS.title: AI SaaS Implementation
aiSaaS.description: Struggling to get value from AI tools you've bought? We implement, configure, and integrate them into your actual workflows.

whatWeveBuilt.title: What we've build
whatWeveBuilt.description: Deep domain expertise. AI-accelerated execution. Production-ready from day one.

insuranceTech.title: From Zero to 25% Market Share
insuranceTech.description: A health insurance tech founder came to us the night before their investor meeting. They had a vision but no product — just an idea and 12 hours to make it real.

customerSupport.title: From Document Chatbot to AI Avatar Platform
customerSupport.description: A chatbot that can read and answer documents. They envisioned something more human, more engaging. We transformed it into a complete AI avatar platform.

notSurePath.title: Not sure with path is right?
notSurePath.description: Multi-location clinic losing revenue to no-shows, drowning in phone calls, missing after-hours bookings.

regulatedExpertise.title: Regulated Industry Expertise
regulatedExpertise.description: Healthcare, insurance, fintech. We understand compliance constraints.

engineers.title: 20+ Engineers
engineers.description: Full team in Chennai. Enterprise-quality systems built to scale.

moveFast.title: We Move Fast
moveFast.description: We've built production platforms overnight when deadlines demanded it.

stayUntilWorks.title: We Stay Until It Works
stayUntilWorks.description: No documentation handoffs. We implement, test, iterate until you see results.

cta.description: Tell us what you're trying to solve. We'll let you know if products or services are the right path.
